m :  of the two houses we have seen  which one do you think fits our needs better  the first one or the second one ?
w :  the second one .  it seems very expensive .  but in the long run  it will save up the money on the maintenance .

question: what does the woman say about the reason for her choice ?
choice: less money will be spent in maintaining the house .
they may save some money for the time being .
she is happy with the price set by the seller .
answer: less money will be spent in maintaining the house .
